name: Easy and Awesome Spinach Salad
author: Lady Scrapalot
summary: This is a very easy spinach salad to make. The dressing has some unusual ingredients but is very delicious. I never have leftovers at potlucks when I take this salad.
ingredients: 4 slices bacon, or more to taste
1 (16 ounce) bag fresh spinach, stems removed
directions: Place the bacon into a skillet over medium heat, and cook until browned and crisp, turning often, about 10 minutes
Transfer the bacon to paper towels to absorb excess grease
Place the spinach into a large salad bowl, and sprinkle with the bacon, hard-cooked eggs, and onion
In a bowl, whisk together the sugar, ketchup, vegetable oil, vinegar, and Worcestershire sauce until the sugar has dissolved
Pour the dressing over the salad, and toss thoroughly to combine all ingredients
